app.title: Applications for: {job_title} {job_classification}
get_priority_list: Contact Talent Cloud to get a list of priorities that applied to this position. They must be reviewed and considered first.
underConsideration.description: Review the applicants in the Veterans and Canadian Citizens section. If none or very few of these applicants meet the requirements, you can still consider non- candian - citizen applications in the Optional Consideration section

optionalConsideration.title: Optional Consideration
optionalConsideration.description: In this group you will find the applicants who are not Canadian Citizens or do not claim to meet the essential criteria.
